messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] The Taming of the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: The Taming of the Samurai was one of the first books on the topic of samurai that I picked up, and I thought it was excellent. It can be a little tough to
messages.messageBody:
'The Taming of the Samurai' was one of the first books on the topic of
samurai that I picked up, and I thought it was excellent. It can be a
little tough to read at times, especially the first couple of sections,
but after putting it down I felt like I knew a heck of a lot more than I
did before I picked it up.

What did you think of the first half Cesare?

Angus

messages.subject: The Taming of the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: I was wondering if someone in this mailing list has read Ikegami s book and has an opinion about it. I am half way thru it... Thanks, cepo
